font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 巅峰： the highest point of development or achievement
【例】 a singer who has reached the pinnacle of career 已到达事业巅峰的歌手
【近】 acme, apex, climax, culmination, meridian, peak, summit, top, zenith
【反】 bottom, nadir 最低点
【记】 pin 针，针尖 + acle 东西；尖顶，顶峰；peak, i=ea, cle=>k
